title: create array to pass to changeIt method

content.question: public void changeIt(int[] arr, int index, int newValue){arr[index] += newValue;}Which of the following code segments, if located in a method in the same class as changeIt, will cause the array myArray to contain {0, 5, 0, 0} ?

topic.text: 3.6: Methods: Passing and Returning References of an Object

skill.text: 3.B: Determine the result or output based on code that contains data abstractions.
